Ok i downloaded for a second time (first time it dropped to less than 1kbps.)
i was downloading at 1mbps the second time got it done fairly quick. mounted, Installed using keygen.
Copyed the two txt files and the exe file for bfbc2. double clicked and then BAM warning your computer has a virus cannot uninstall. LMAO HAHA jokes jokes nah it worked great. For a strange reason my graphics etc etc are below the minimum requirments yet i got to play on the highest detail with only some lag. The games great reminds me of cod 4 and stuff great gameplay. Im warning those who cant be paitent though. To beware of the level "snow blind" it's really hard and only way to complete it is CONCENTRATION, PAITENCE and COMMON SENSE. took me 2 go's to actualy get what i had to do considering the longer you stay out you get cold screens gets awfully small (cause of ice) and alot of enemys shooting you..it's simple go in EVERY building within 10 metres of each one. shoot the doors. shoot the people inside. continue till you reach the bottom of the mountain. Don't worry this isnt a spoiler the mission is actualy fun. just tips to do it properly
cause im pretty darn sure alot of people wont be able to complete it without paitence and common sense :L
